string.value: They say if you train in a group, the journey becomes more fun for everyone. Get details from Power B. Fore.
They say if you train in a group, the journey becomes more fun for everyone. The journey is long, but if you work with others, you'll all be able to achieve your goals!
You were able to successfully complete Power B. Fore's training sessions.

string.name: summary
string.value: Party hunting allows you to complete quests much more quickly than attempting them alone.

Hey, are you familiar with the concept of #bParty Hunting#k? It's when you venture out to hunt as a group, with the mentality of 'all for one and one for all.' If you train in a party, it will allow you to overcome some tough obstacles.\r\n
This training session will not be easy for you to complete by yourself, but if you team up and train in a party, it should be a piece of cake. Do you want to try it?
Alright then. Defeat #b200 Stumps#k. It will not be easy, so try joining a party and hunting with others!
Teamwork is one of the most important aspects of your combat abilities, one that you need to nurture in order to become an excellent adventurer.
Great work there. Don't forget, hunting as a party may help you complete your quests much faster.
I don't think you have defeated all those Stumps yet.
